subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Families and Family Life
Parkinson's Disease
lead_paragraph: As Taylor Phinney trains to become an Olympic cyclist, he is watching his father, a former professional athlete, being ravaged by Parkinson’s disease.
snippet: As Taylor Phinney trains to become an Olympic cyclist, he is watching his father, a former professional athlete, being ravaged by Parkinson’s disease.
